85247.content:
>! ![](assets/2020-10-29/00014.png)

>```
select railways.gid,round(sum( st_length(st_intersection( railways.geom, landuse.geom))) )
from railways,landuse
where  st_intersects(railways.geom, landuse.geom)
 and landuse.fclass = 'forest'
group by railways.gid
```
 

>!![](assets/2020-10-29/00015.png)

 > ```
select p1.gid,p1.name,count(p2.gid) as cnt
from pois p1, pois p2
where p1.fclass='hotel'
and p2.fclass='restaurant'
and ST_DWithin(p1.geom,p2.geom,100)
group by p1.gid
having count(p2.gid) >9
order by cnt desc, p1.gid asc
```


>!![](assets/2020-10-29/00016.png)

>```
select p1.gid,p1.name,
(select min(st_distance(p1.geom,p2.geom)) d from places p2 where p1.gid <> p2.gid) dist
from places p1
order by dist desc
limit 5
```


>! Ovaj zadatak ne znam

 >![](assets/2020-10-29/00017.png)

 >a ovaj sam dobio toÄno rjeÅ¡enje ali oÄito na krivi naÄin

select buildings.gid, round(st_distance(water.geom,buildings.geom)) distance,round(st_area(buildings.geom)) as area
from buildings,water
where water.name= 'Crveno jezero'
and ST_DFullyWithin(water.geom,buildings.geom,1200)
order by area desc
limit 5
```

86915.content:
![](assets/2020-11-02/00015.png)
```sql
select buildings.gid, round(st_distance(buildings.geom,water.geom)), round(st_area(buildings.geom))
from buildings, water
where water.name like '%Crveno jezero%' and ST_CoveredBy(buildings.geom,ST_Buffer(water.geom,1000))
order by st_area(buildings.geom) desc
limit 5
```
![](assets/2020-11-02/00016.png)
```sql
select nature.name, round(min(st_distance(nature.geom,pois.geom)))
from nature, pois
where nature.fclass like 'beach' and pois.fclass like 'bar' 
group by nature.name
order by nature.name asc
```
![](assets/2020-11-02/00017.png)
```sql
select  round(sum(st_area(landuse.geom)))
from landuse 
where (fclass like 'forest' or fclass like 'geom') and landuse.name like '%gaj%'
```
![](assets/2020-11-02/00018.png)
```sql
with ajmo as(
select buildings.name, water.name, round(st_distance(buildings.geom,water.geom)), 
rank() over (partition by buildings.name order by round(st_distance(buildings.geom,water.geom))) as rank1
from buildings, water
where (lower(buildings.name) like '%dvd%' or lower(buildings.name) like '%vatrog%') and water.fclass like 'river'
)
select * from ajmo 
where rank1 in (1,2)
```
![](assets/2020-11-02/00019.png)
```sql
select roads.name, round(sum(st_length(roads.geom))), round(sum(st_length(ST_Intersection(roads.geom,landuse.geom))))
, round((sum(st_length(ST_Intersection(roads.geom,landuse.geom)))/sum(st_length(roads.geom)))*100) ||'%' as percentage
from roads, landuse 
where lower(roads.name) like '%Å¡etaliÅ¡te%' and landuse.fclass like 'forest' and ST_Intersects(roads.geom,landuse.geom)
group by roads.name
order by sum(st_length(ST_Intersection(roads.geom,landuse.geom)))/sum(st_length(roads.geom)) desc
```

86955.content:
![](assets/2020-11-02/00020.png)

ovo nije rjesenje nego timeout:

```
create view green as select * from landuse where fclass = 'forest' or fclass = 'grass' or fclass = 'park';
create view not_green as select * from landuse where fclass != 'forest' and fclass != 'grass' and fclass !='park';

select res.gid, st_area(res.geom)
from landuse res, not_green, green, muny m
where res.fclass = 'residential'
and m.name_2 = 'Vis'
and st_within(res.geom, m.geom)
and st_touches(res.geom, green.geom)
and not st_touches(res.geom, not_green.geom);
```

87006.content:
> @DuckItUp#85247 Ovaj zadatak ne znam

> [![](https://fer.studosi.net/assets/files/2020-10-29/1603976603-226445-image.png)]()

Ja sam ovako doÅ¡ao do rjeÅ¡enja ..

Dakle zadatak:

Pretpostavite da Å¾elite za sve Å¡ume i vatrogasne postaje pronaÄ‡i njihovu meÄ‘usobnu udaljenost i udaljenost pojedine vatrogasne postaje do najbliÅ¾ih zaliha vode.

Za svaku Å¡umu (landuse, "forest") kojoj je definirano ime i zgradu koja u nazivu sadrÅ¾i niz znakova "vatrog" ili "dvd" (bez obzira na velika ili mala slova) ispisati:

ime Å¡ume, udaljenost do zgrade, ime zgrade, udaljenost zgrade do najbliÅ¾eg vodenog objekta ili rijeke (water, 'water' ili 'river') te ime tog vodenog objekta (mora biti definirano).

Zapise poredati uzlazno prema imenu Å¡ume, a zatim prema udaljenosti.

Udaljenosti zaokruÅ¾ite na cijeli broj.

`select landuse.name as forest, round(st_distance(landuse.geom, b1.geom)) as d1, b1.name as firedpt,

MIN(round(st_distance(w1.geom, b1.geom))) over (partition by landuse.name, b1.name) as d2,

w1.name as water

from landuse, buildings as b1, water as w1 

where (UPPER(b1.name) LIKE UPPER('%vatrog%') or UPPER(b1.name) LIKE UPPER('%dvd%')) and landuse.fclass = 'forest' and 

landuse.name is not null and w1.name is not null and (w1.fclass = 'water' or w1.fclass = 'river') and

st_distance(w1.geom, b1.geom) = (select distinct MIN(st_distance(w2.geom, b2.geom)) over (partition by b2.name) from buildings as b2, water as w2 where b1.gid = b2.gid and (UPPER(b2.name) LIKE UPPER('%vatrog%') or UPPER(b2.name) LIKE UPPER('%dvd%')) and w2.name is not null and (w2.fclass = 'water' or w2.fclass = 'river'))                                                                                       

order by landuse.name asc, d1 asc`

87076.content:
SliÄan zadatak ko kolega iznad, ali rijeÅ¡eno bez podupita, i zadana udaljenost je fiksan broj
>! ![](assets/2020-11-02/00028.png)

```sql
WITH t AS (SELECT landuse.name l, ROUND(MIN(ST_Distance(landuse.geom, buildings.geom))) dist, buildings.name b,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY landuse.name ORDER BY ROUND(MIN(ST_Distance(landuse.geom, buildings.geom)))) r
FROM buildings, landuse
WHERE (LOWER(buildings.name) LIKE '%dvd%' OR LOWER(buildings.name) LIKE '%vatrog%' )
AND landuse.fclass = 'forest'
AND ST_Distance(landuse.geom, buildings.geom) < 5000 
AND landuse.name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY landuse.name, buildings.name
ORDER BY buildings.name)
SELECT l, dist, b FROM t
WHERE r = 1
```

91007.content:
PronaÄ‡i opÄ‡ine (muny) u Splitsko-dalmatinskoj Å¾upaniji (muny, name_1) kroz koje prolazi pruga.

Potrebno je ispisati naziv opÄ‡ine (muny, name_2) i duljinu pruge (railways) koja prolazi kroz tu opÄ‡inu.

Zapise poredati uzlazno s obzirom na duljinu pruge koja prolazi opÄ‡inom.

```
SELECT 
	opcina.name_2,
    SUM(ST_LENGTH(ST_INTERSECTION(pruga.geom,opcina.geom)))as duljinaPruge
FROM 
	muny as opcina,
    railways as pruga
WHERE 
	opcina.name_1='Splitsko-Dalmatinska'
	AND ST_INTERSECTS(pruga.geom,opcina.geom)
GROUP BY opcina.name_2
ORDER BY duljinaPruge ASC
```

254576.content:
@"cavlic"#p91333 Å to je krivo?
```
select distinct railways.gid,count(*) over() cnt
from railways, landuse
where landuse.fclass = 'vineyard'
and st_length(railways.geom) < 20000
and st_disjoint(railways.geom,landuse.geom)
and st_distance(railways.geom,landuse.geom) <= 100
```
